name: The QWERTYUIOP Quiz - Top Line Words. | Humanities | 10 Questions

questions.text:
What is this five letter word?

Substance that holds glass in window frame.
questions.explanation:
putty.

	Putty is a mixture of cement (whiting made of finely ground chalk) and linseed oil.

questions.text:
This is a five letter word:

Form words on paper, by hand.
questions.explanation:
write.

	The word write comes from the Middle English "writen." An early form of writing was developed by the Mesopotamians as a method of keeping account of traded commodities.

questions.text:
What is this six letter word?

Pungent seasoning condiment.
questions.explanation:
pepper.

	Pepper is the dried fruit from plants of the piperaceae family.

questions.text:
This word has five letters:

Group of soldiers.
questions.explanation:
troop.

	The term was troop was first used for a small group of cavalry. Troop can also mean a group of people or animals. A troupe is something completely different, usually referring to an ensemble of performers or entertainers.

questions.text:
A word of just three letters:

Baked pastry case filled with fruit or meat.
questions.explanation:
pie.

	A early variety of pie had no lid. The pastry case was used as the container to cook and store the meat and sauce ingredients, much like a casserole.

questions.text:
Here is a word of five letters:

A fish, most often found in freshwater.
questions.explanation:
trout.

	Trout is a popular game fish and a member of the salmon family. They are commonly found in streams and lakes.

questions.text:
This word has six letters:

A small or slender female is described as being this.
questions.explanation:
petite.

	Petite comes from the French, feminine, "petit."

questions.text:
What is this five letter word?

No noise.
questions.explanation:
quiet.

	Quiet comes from the Latin "quietus" meaning to rest.

questions.text:
This word has five letters:

Amusing and clever person is this.
questions.explanation:
witty.

	Witty comes from the Old English "witan." The term is often used in relation to writing of speech.

questions.text:
Here is a word of seven letters:

Bowls and vases made from clay.
questions.explanation:
pottery.

	Pottery is shaped from moist clay and then hardened by heating.
